name: Princess Verdaxia
entry: Verdaxia, the youngest of Tharagon's kin, is a master of subterfuge and manipulation. Specializing in espionage, she undermines Akanul from within, turning allies into enemies through cunning and deceit. She ability to blend into forests and command nature itself makes her an elusive and deadly foe.
title: The Emerald Whisper
